dct_description_sm: Relief shown pictorially. Scale determined by using graticule method. Maps in upper corners and lower left corner: Frislant insula -- Farre insul[a]e -- Scetland insulæ. From: Gerardi Mercatoris Atlas, sive, Cosmographicae meditationes de fabrica mundi et fabricati figura. Amsterodami : sumptibus et typis aeneis Henrici Hondij, 1628. Text on verso: Le pole arctique, et la description des terres septentrionales.
dct_publisher_sm: [Amsterodami : sumptibus et typis aeneis Henrici Hondij, 1628]
